    1: <?php
    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env\Model\Http\Parse;
    3:
    4: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Env AS Env;
    5: use Symbiotatk\Symbtk\File AS File;
    6:
    7: /**
    8: * Find elements
    9: * @param String $uri
    10: * @return Array $elements
    11: */
    12: function Elements(String $uri) {
    13: $route = Route($uri);
    14: $route = (strpos($route, Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER))
    15: ? explode(Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER, $route)[0]
    16: : $route;
    17:
    18: return (($route === Env\PATH_DELIMITER)
    19: || (sizeof(elements_from_string($route)) < 2))
    20: ? []
    21: : array_filter(
    22: array_slice(elements_from_string($route),1),
    23: function( $v ) {
    24: return !( is_null( $v) or '' === $v ); }
    25: );
    26: }
    27:
    28: /**
    29: * Find hash
    30: * @param String $uri
    31: * @return String $hash
    32: */
    33: function Hash (String $uri) {
    34: $parts = parse_url($uri);
    35: $args = [];
    36: return (isset($parts['fragment']))
    37: ? $parts['fragment']
    38: : '';
    39: }
    40:
    41: /**
    42: * Find modifier
    43: * @param String $uri
    44: * @return String $modiifer
    45: */
    46: function Modifier (String $uri) {
    47: $route = Route($uri);
    48: return (strpos($route, Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER))
    49: ? explode(Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER, $route)[1]
    50: : '';
    51: }
    52:
    53: /**
    54: * Find offset
    55: * @param String $uri
    56: * @return String $offset
    57: */
    58: function Offset(String $uri) {
    59: $parts = parse_url($uri);
    60: return rtrim($parts['path'], File\ds());
    61: }
    62:
    63: /**
    64: * Find QUERY_STRING
    65: * @param String $uri
    66: * @return String $query_string
    67: */
    68: function QueryString(String $uri) {
    69: $parts = parse_url($uri);
    70: return (isset($parts['query'])) ? $parts['query'] : false;
    71: }
    72:
    73: /**
    74: * Find resource
    75: * @param String $uri
    76: * @return String $resource
    77: */
    78: function Resource(String $uri) {
    79: $route = Route($uri);
    80: $route = (strpos($route, Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER))
    81: ? explode(Env\MODIFIER_DELIMITER, $route)[0]
    82: : $route;
    83:
    84: return ($route === Env\PATH_DELIMITER)
    85: ? $route
    86: : explode(Env\PATH_DELIMITER,
    87: ltrim($route, Env\PATH_DELIMITER))[0];
    88: }
    89:
    90: /**
    91: * Find route
    92: * @param String $uri
    93: * @return String $route
    94: */
    95: function Route(String $uri) {
    96: $parts = parse_url($uri);
    97: $args = [];
    98: if (isset($parts['query'])) {
    99: parse_str($parts['query'], $args);
    100: }
    101: $keys = array_keys($args);
    102: return (sizeof($keys) > 0)
    103: ? $keys[0]
    104: : File\ds();
    105: }
    106:
    107: /**
    108: * Elements from string
    109: * @param $str
    110: * @return Array $ele
    111: */
    112: function elements_from_string(String $str) {
    113: return explode(Env\PATH_DELIMITER, ltrim($str, Env\PATH_DELIMITER));
    114: }
